body: Anyone know the proper way to upgrade a rank? If you have Gold to Emerald or Emerald to Diamond?
body_tagged: Anyone know the proper way to upgrade a rank? If you have Gold to Emerald or Emerald to Diamond?
title: Upgrade Ranks

replies.body: pretty sure you go about buying the rank you want as normal and it will show you how much the net cost is later in the purchase
replies.body_tagged: pretty sure you go about buying the rank you want as normal and it will show you how much the net cost is later in the purchase

replies.body: Yeah, either do what Mooch said, or buy another Emerald and have a senior staff member merge it to diamond for you.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, either do what Mooch said, or buy another Emerald and have a senior staff member merge it to diamond for you.

replies.body: You have emerald and a gold rank you would need to buy another gold then contact a sr staff member to get diamond.
replies.body_tagged: You have emerald and a gold rank you would need to buy another gold then contact a sr staff member to get diamond.

replies.body:
OK - Done - I hope a Sr. Mod reads this to update my rank.
Thanks again
- lol it moved me to gold :(

replies.body: Yeah, I sorted out your ranks for you.
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, I sorted out your ranks for you.

replies.body: guys anyone know how to upgrade ranks as i want to play in the nebula but it says i have to be upgraded anyone know what that means?
replies.body_tagged: guys anyone know how to upgrade ranks as i want to play in the nebula but it says i have to be upgraded anyone know what that means?

replies.body:
When it says that you have to be upgraded to play/join the game it means the game is full. And the only way to play when a game is full is to be a donator by getting one of the three ranks in the shop (www.avicus.net/shop).
Otherwise I would recommend doing /join exactly once you get teleported to the new map to join.
replies.body_tagged:
When it says that you have to be upgraded to play/join the game it means the game is full. And the only way to play when a game is full is to be a donator by getting one of the three ranks in the shop (www.avicus.net/shop).
Otherwise I would recommend doing /join exactly once you get teleported to the new map to join.

reply_to.body: guys anyone know how to upgrade ranks as i want to play in the nebula but it says i have to be upgraded anyone know what that means?
reply_to.body_tagged: guys anyone know how to upgrade ranks as i want to play in the nebula but it says i have to be upgraded anyone know what that means?

replies.body:
Please note that you're only required to have a premium rank to join games when they're exclusively full (or exceeding maximum player capacity on both teams).

If you purchase a premium rank you'll be able to join full games and you also are given a credit multiplier (you earn credits faster).

To purchase a rank you go to https://avicus.net/shop and follow the steps given.
If you have a problem with your purchase you can email support@avicus.net or contact a Staff Member (perferibly a Senior Moderator or Administrator) for assistance.
